mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hall and Stairway, Mt. Vernon Mansion. Showing clock at head of stairs.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of central passage at Mount Vernon looking towards the staircase and west entrance. Wallpaper in stairwell to second floor. Mounted on orange board. Label on reverse printed directly onto cardboard mount reads: Hall and Stairway, Mt. Vernon Mansion. Showing clock at head of stairs. Copyright by the Mount Vernon Ladies' Union Association. Luke C. Dillon, Authorized Photographer, Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 Penna. Avenue, Washington City, D. C.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
Mansion interior
